attributes.action: Meningitis B vaccine availability FREE to every child
attributes.additional_details: The fact that people must PAY to have their child immunised against this illness is outrageous. This vaccine should be free for EVERY child. It should be included in the childhood immunisation program free of charge irrespective if the child is high risk or not. Children who have already contracted Meningitis B should be included.

rejection.details: Please see: routine childhood immunisation against meningitis B
